name: FTP
semantic_context: Transfer files via FTP or SFTP
natural_language_description: 这是 FTP 节点。主要用于: Transfer files via FTP or SFTP

protocol.name: protocol
protocol.natural_language_description: 参数名: Protocol | 作用: File transfer protocol | 默认值: ftp

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: download
available_options: Rename (值: rename) - Rename/move oldPath to newPath

path.name: path
path.description: Path of directory to list contents of
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Path | 作用: Path of directory to list contents of | 默认值: / | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: createDirectories (值: None) - Whether to recursively create destination directory when renaming an existing file or folder

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

oldPath.name: oldPath
oldPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Old Path | (必填项)

newPath.name: newPath
newPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Path | (必填项)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: The text content of the file to upload
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: The text content of the file to upload | 默认值: True

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

recursive.name: recursive
recursive.description: Whether to return object representing all directories / objects recursively found within SFTP server
recursive.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recursive | 作用: Whether to return object representing all directories / objects recursively found within SFTP server | 默认值: False | (必填项)
